Sentencas: As is well known, a solid oxide fuel cell(SOFC) is a device that can convert chemical energy directly into electrical energy.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: The possibility to grow thin films of oxide materials is of great importance in the development of SOFC.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Recently, it is expected that oxide heterostructures, with almost ideal interfaces, should lead to the interesting artificial materials with some novel properties.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: So we have prepared superlattice electrolyte thin films.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: On the MgO single-crystal substrates, multilayer epitaxial thin-film heterostructures of 20 mol% samarium-oxide-doped ceria (Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta, SDC) and 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (Y2O3: ZrO2 YSZ) have been deposited in turn, using the pulsed laser deposition (PLD) technique.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Five different superlattices (SDC/YSZ)(N) (N = 3, 5, 10, 20, 30) films are fabricated, keeping the total thickness constant (300 nm), but with a different number of hetero-interfaces.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: The choice of coupling SDC and YSZ aims to have both layers in the superlattices made of oxygen-ion conductors with compatible crystallographic features.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: On one hand, we have to remove any potential contribution of the deposition substrate to the total conductivity, and the superlattices may be grown on < 110 >-oriented
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film
Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: On the other hand, the YSZ electrolyte film requires that the temperature should be higher, and SDC as the electrolyte leakage; both should be combined with each other, so as to have complementary advantages.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: In this way, not only the temperature of SOFCs is reduced, but also the leakage avoided.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Because YSZ and SDC both belong to cubic fluorite structure and have similar lattice parameters, the lattice constant of YSZ is 5.14 angstrom, and the lattice constant of SDC is 5.44 angstrom.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Compatible crystal properties, oxygen ion conductivity, and great matching defects can lead to a semi-coherent interface between the ZrO2 and CeO2 layers.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film
Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD), high-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HR-TEM) and AC impedance mearurements are used to characterize the surface morphology, phase structure and electrical properties of the electrolyte film.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Results show that the superlattice (SDC/YSZ)(N) electrolyte films will form obviously interface and better superlattice structure.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: This kind of thin films do not show crack, with no element diffusion at the interfaces, growing uniformly, densely and smoothly.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: Electrochemical measurements show a sizable increase in conductivity with increasing number of SDC/YSZ interfaces.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film

Sentencas: So it is an ideal low-temperature fuel cell electrolyte materials.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of the superlattice (Sm-doped ceria/yttria-stabilized zirconia)N electrolyte film
